net.nexttext.renderer

Class TextPageRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nexttext.renderer.TextPageRenderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundingBoxRenderer, G2DTextPageRenderer, G3DTextPageRenderer, TextInternalsRenderer, VelocityRenderer

    public abstract class TextPageRenderer
extends Object
    An interface that represents classes capable of rendering a TextPage in a PApplet.

    • Method Detail

      • renderPage

        public abstract void renderPage(TextPage textPage)
        The rendering loop. Takes as input a TextPage and traverses its root node, rendering all the TextObjects along the way.
        Parameters:
        textPage - the TextPage to render

      • getPApplet

        public PApplet getPApplet()
        Returns the PApplet used for drawing.
        Returns:
        PApplet the drawing surface
